uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers

Class ActivityMemento

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.framework.MementoState
      • uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers.ActivityMemento
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ActivityMemento
extends MementoState
implements java.io.Serializable
    Created by Kristiana on 12/01/2016. An implementation class of the Memento design pattern, allows to save the Settings state when a user is created and then to retrieve the default settings if the user wants to return to them
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
